players.name: Wilt Chamberland
players.notes: Scored 100 points in a single game, most ever.

players.name: Oscar Robinson
players.notes: Only player ever to average a triple double in a season.

players.name: Bill Russel
players.notes: Won 9 championships as a player and 2 as a coach of the celtics.

players.name: Tim Duncan
players.notes: Still currently playing and is considered the best power forward of all time.

players.name: Kobe Bryant
players.notes: Still currently playing. One of only 3 players to score 30,000 or more career points.

players.name: Jery West
players.notes: The NBA logo was desinged from his image.
